title: "Beatty's tour in Europe," in "foreign lands," or "Europe as I saw it,"
author: Beatty, Daniel F. [from old catalog]
snippet: Grayfriar's Church and churchyard is replete with interest. The Martyrs' Monument contains the following inscription: "From May 27, 1661, that the most noble Marquis of Argyle was beheaded, to the 17th of February, 1688, that Mr.
